title: Egg-Shaped Mace Head
period: Predynastic Period, Naqada II Period or later
description:
Pear shaped mace-head of white marble with yellow interspersion with relatively wide perforation at base.

Condition: Intact. Worn at openings of perforation.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
